mechanics.trigger: Creature affected by Tongues hears a spoken language

mechanics.condition: Creature is affected by Tongues AND Listener knows at least one language AND Listener can hear the speaking creature
mechanics.outcome: Listener understands what the speaking creature says

description_text: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears. Moreover, when the target speaks, any creature that knows at least one language and can hear the target understands what it says.
